content.rendered:
BIG NEWS:
It’s official… the next Walls of Books store will open in New Orleans, LA!
Wonder where the next one will be?

excerpt.rendered: BIG NEWS: It’s official… the next Walls of Books store will open in New Orleans, LA! Wonder where the next one will be?
